waybar_icon_not_rendering.likely_cause: Waybar module is static (no exec, no return-type json) so format string renders as plain text, but glyph may not be in waybar's configured font, or waybar needs a label wrapper
possible_fixes: Wrap glyph in pango span with explicit nerd font: "format": "󰊢"
Switch to a simpler ASCII/unicode char if font doesn't include nf-md glyphs
Add return-type json with a small exec script like waybar-claude does for mr-argus

desktop_icon_svg.symptom: SVG icon may not render in all contexts (walker, app launchers)
desktop_icon_svg.likely_cause: gtk-update-icon-cache not run, or SVG needs rasterized variants
